about_the_game:
In a future much like our own a new strain of virus devastates the globe. More contagious than anything before. You find yourself trapped amid a pandemic, with enemies everywhere how will you make it out?

Shoot, sneak or run through waves of zombies in this post apocalyptic cyberpunk zombie adventure.

Armed with only a pistol and your good senses. You need to get out of a densely populated city before you're next.

Enemies are plenty, and everywhere so keep moving. Zombies will walk, then Sprint at you. Robot security drones will kill anything alive.

Weapons and ammo are scarce so save what you have and if you find a more powerful weapon use it until you can't. It won't be there long.

You won't save the world this time but can you save yourself?

content_descriptors.notes: There is a lot of first person zombie killing.

detailed_description:
In a future much like our own a new strain of virus devastates the globe. More contagious than anything before. You find yourself trapped amid a pandemic, with enemies everywhere how will you make it out?

Shoot, sneak or run through waves of zombies in this post apocalyptic cyberpunk zombie adventure.

Enemies are plenty, and everywhere so keep moving. Zombies will walk, then Sprint at you. Robot security drones will kill anything alive.

Weapons and ammo are scarce so save what you have and if you find a more powerful weapon use it until you can't. It won't be there long.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Covid 2069

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 SP1 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: Short descriptione were told to wash our hands. We were told to wear a mask. We were told to stay at home. We didn't, now we've got countless undead on our hands
